<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/82206</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>82206</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>NCTE_Scoilnet</catalog>
            <entry>8056</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Paint & Colour Quiz</string>
            <string language="es">Cuestionario sobre pintura y color</string>
            <string language="ga">Tráth na gCeist faoi Phéint & Dath</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Farbe U. Farbe Quiz</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Peinture et Jeu de Couleur</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Pintura & Quiz Da Cor</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Vernice & Quiz Di Colore</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Χρώμα & διαγωνισμός γνώσεων χρώματος</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Children will consolidate their knowledge of the paint & colour strand of the curriculum with a fun activity.</string>
            <string language="es">Los niños consolidarán sus conocimientos de la sección del curriculum de pintura y color con una actividad divertida.</string>
            <string language="ga">Láidreoidh na daltaí a n-eolas ar shnáth péinte & datha an churaclaim le gníomhaíocht spóirtiúil.</string>
          </description>
          <language>en</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Visual Arts</string>
            <string language="es">Artes visuales</string>
            <string language="ga">Amharcealaíona</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kinder vereinigen ihr Wissen der Farbe u. der 
Farbe Faser des Lehrplans mit einer Spaßaktivität.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les enfants consolideront leur connaissance de la
peinture et du brin de couleur du programme d'études avec une 
activité d'amusement.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">As crianças consolidarão seu conhecimento da 
pintura & da costa da cor do curriculum com uma atividade do 
divertimento.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">I bambini consolideranno la loro conoscenza della
vernice & del filo di colore del programma di studi con un'attività 
di divertimento.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τα παιδιά θα παγιώσουν τη γνώση τους του χρώματος & 
του σκέλους χρώματος του προγράμματος σπουδών με μια 
δραστηριότητα διασκέδασης.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sichtkünste</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Arts Visuels</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Artes Visuais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Arti Visive</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εικαστηκές τέχνες</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <metadataSchema>LREv4.0</metadataSchema>
          <identifier>

          <description>
            <string language="en">The content on this site is protected by copyright under Irish and European law. All materials may be downloaded and copied for non-commercial purposes only, provided that the source is acknowledged. The reproduction of material for commercial purposes is strictly prohibited.

Material within the linked sites outside of Scoilnet may also have copyright restrictions and this should be checked on these websites should you plan to use their content in any way.</string>
